message: I step through into a long hallway.
So this is the inside of Oval Tower...
I've heard that part of the tower is open to the public, but we come in through the back entrance, so there aren't any guests around.
I hear some footsteps, probably guards on patrol.
As I walk carefully down the hall, I eventually see an elevator. Two guards are stationed in front of it.
I immediately slip into a side hall, peeking around the corner to observe the guards.
There isn't anything to hide behind this time.
What do I do?

name: 警備Ｃ
message: "Hey, what are you doing over there?"
I turn around to see a guard standing at the other end of the hall.
Fuck! He must've come out of one of the rooms. Now I hear the guards by the elevator approaching.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Fuck...!"

name: 警備Ｃ
message: "Stop right there!"
But at that exact moment, the elevator opens and a well-dressed couple steps out. Guests?
The guards at the elevator are momentarily distracted. Now's my chance!

name: 警備Ｃ
message: "Stop!"
I dash out of my hiding spot and sprint for the elevator.
The couple flees and the guards try to stop me, but I slip past them and into the elevator just as the doors start to close.

name: 警備Ａ
message: "Wait!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Fuck off!"

name: 警備Ａ
message: "Guh!"
I kick the guard away, then yank my foot back.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Phew... That was clo―"
But just as I think I'm safe, another guard sticks his hands between the doors and tries to pry them open.
Shit!
I pull out the stun gun and jam it into his hand.

name: 警備Ｂ
message: "Agh!"
He jerks back.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ren!"
Ren jumps out of my bag and hits one of the buttons with his paw.
The door closes before the guards can recover.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...That was close."

name: エレベーター
message: "Please press the button for your desired floor."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Oh, right."
No time to waste. I get up and press a button for a random floor.
The elevator shakes, then starts to ascend.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Haa... Oww."
I must've smacked my shoulder on the floor when I slid into the elevator. I crouch down next to Ren, rubbing the joint.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Good job, Ren."

name: 蓮
message: "I may not literally have a heart, but you nearly gave me a heart attack."

name: 蒼葉
message: "But it all worked out, right? Thanks to you."

name: 蓮
message: "Just don't get cocky."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I wonder if we can like, sneak through a crawlspace in the ceiling or something, like they do in the movies."

name: 蓮
message: "I think you should stick to more realistic methods."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah, I know. ...Huh?"
I pick up Ren to put him back in my bag, but something makes me stop.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ren. What is that?"
There's something glistening by Ren's eye. Like a drop of water.

name: 蒼葉
message: "You've got something on your eye."
I reach for it, but Ren turns his head away.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ren?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Look at me. What's wrong?"
I recall how Ren pushed my face away when I tried to rub foreheads with him.

Nothing like that has happened since, and with everything else, I almost forgot about it.

But now...

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey, Ren."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Let me see your eye."

name: 蓮
message: "It doesn't matter. You have more important things to do. "

name: 蒼葉
message: "It doesn't matter?"

name: 蓮
message: "Right. It's trivial. Don't let it bother you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What are you talking about?"
I bring my face closer to his, ignoring the fact that he's avoiding me.

name: 蒼葉
message: "How many times do I have to tell you? I'm not okay unless you're okay."

name: 蓮
message: "I won't let myself be a burden."

name: 蒼葉
message: "That's not what I meant!"

name: 蓮
message: "If I can't perform my function, then I'm worthless to you. But don't worry. I'll make sure that doesn't―"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Whoa! Worthless? What's with you, man?"

name: 蓮
message: "You're worried I might cease functioning. But I won't let that―"

name: 蒼葉
message: "No! That's not what I'm talking about. I'm worried about you!"

name: 蓮
message: "It's fine. I won't cause you any trouble."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'm not worried about that! Ren, listen to me."

name: 蓮
message: "Don't concern yourself with me."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey... Enough with that!"
Before I know it, I'm shouting. I can't take it any more.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What happened to you? You're not making any sense."
That's when the elevator stops.
